p: In the present investigation, S. officinalis EO was also characterized by 1,8 cineole (30.4% and 48.4%) as the most abundant compound both in the liquid and in vapor phase, while S. sclarea EO, which was less active among the aromatic plants investigated, was rich in linalyl acetate (62.6%) and linalool (28.9%) in the liquid and vapor phase, respectively.
